item.title: The correct way to write fizz-buzz
item.description:
Often during downtime, I find myself wondering to youtube to pass the time. Earlier today that lead me to Tom Scott’s new video on the usage of fizz-buzz as a programmer interview question:
During the video, Tom discussed about how programmers write their solution in a multitude of different ways. I thought it would be interesting to try my own hand at it, and see what I came up with…

item.title: About me
item.description: HI. I’m a third year Computer Science Student studying at the University of Liverpool, in the UK. Now working in London. Currently: London, Software Engineering intern @ IBM Web Developer/admin @ 7Cav.us Past: Freelance Web Developer Rainmeter skin Developer (~2013) Projects: CavTools, a general plugin system for 7Cav.us Xenfull Teams, plugin for the XenForo framework [To be released]
